column4: i want to dual boot win7/karmic, i am planning to resize my win7 partition and install karmic on the free space.  do i still need to allocate swap if i have 8GB of RAM?
you alwys can add swap-files later, if really needed
does karmic automatically use a swap file?  or do you have to do some config?
idk, i guess you have to do it manually
